item.title: Fly tipping, 22nd September
item.description:
Disgusting rubbish all over walkway as usual. Something needs to be done regarding this as itâ€™s an ongoing problem. Neighbours are of the same opinion that removal of recycling bins may help as these are full of incorrect rubbish and take weeks to get emptied

item.title: Dangerous road layout, 22nd September
item.description:
Cars and bikes pull straight in not giving way to pedestrians and just cut in front of us on our pavement road markings not clear it it is a very dangerous turning for all involved cars, bikes, and pedestrians I see at least 2 to 3 near misses every day
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Queensbridge Road, Hackney, London

item.title: Small Sofa, 22nd September
item.description:

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Seven Sisters Road, Hackney, London
